body.name: Linen TENCEL Lyocell Duvet Cover Set - Soft Duvet Cover King, Sustainable Moisture-Wicking Cooling Duvet Cover Set King, Luxury Bedding Set, 1 Duvet Cover, 2 Shams, Brick Rose

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Double Stitch by Bedsure Store

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Thoughtful Craftsmanship】: With the timeless style of linen and remarkable softness of TENCEL lyocell, this high-quality duvet cover set offers a natural, relaxed aesthetic with a perfectly lived-in vibe. Plus, they're less prone to pilling and more anti-wrinkle than 100% linen or cotton. Designed with a keen eye for craftsmanship, the subtle touches—including carefully placed recycled shell recycled shell buttons, trim, and double stitched detailing—elevate your bedding experience.

【Unmatched Softness】: Crafted with care, experience linen like you've never felt before. Using a superior finishing process and innovative sand washing unique to Double Stitch, we've created a linen fabric blend that surpasses all others on the market. By removing any residual stiffness, unlike traditional linen, there's no breaking-in required. Soft, luxurious, and lightweight from the moment you lay on them – these sheets get even softer with time.

【Breathable & Temperature Regulating】: Made with our masterfully crafted proprietary blend of materials designed for the ultimate sleeping experience. With an optimal balance of 80% TENCEL lyocell and 20% linen, this duvet cover set offers the benefits of both materials. Our specially engineered fabric ensures remarkable breathability and outstanding thermal regulation, keeping you comfortable all year long. Enjoy the distinctive enhanced water absorption for a dry, comfortable sleep.

【Made with Natural Materials】: Our water efficient TENCEL lyocell, made from wood pulp, recovers all solvents used in its closed-loop production process to reduce waste and prevent undue impact. We incorporate French flax linen, which requires minimal water to thrive, making it a highly sustainable choice. With an OEKO-TEX certification for chemical safety, rest assured that our bedding is free from harmful substances, supports a healthy sleep environment, and offers a long lifespan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I took the risk!
reviews.reviewText: Felt this was risky purchase as the Double Stitch line by Bedsure appears to be new and there were very few reviews. However, we have purchased a different duvet cover set by Bedsure and have been very happy with it so I decided to roll the dice on this set. The material is super soft, doesn’t get horribly wrinkly, has beautiful stitching and seems to be great quality. My only possible complaint would be the sand color has a little bit more reddish/pinkish undertones than it shows in the pictures but I’m okay with it. Really glad I made this purchase - highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and well made
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with the quality right out of the box but waited to review until I washed it. It’s even softer now. I love it. I love linen but don’t like the extra care that comes with it so this item was a perfect choice. I will have to keep an eye out for sales so I can try their sheets and maybe more colors in the duvet. This particular color was gorgeous against dark green and other soft tones for Christmas and will work great with pretty much every season of the year. 💕

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than a Queen
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Queen size for my queen bed, and when you order the size online it days "queen" but when you receive the order, the tag says full/Queen. So it's supposed to fit a full and a queen sized bed, but it was a bit small for my queen size. I was better off buying a king for my queen. I've never had this issue before with other bed sheet brands (I usually order from Magnolia) Kinda disappointed, but the sheets are pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made and supple
reviews.reviewText: Love the fabric! It is really wrinkle resistant and a great quality. Washed on arrival per the recommendation but it was super soft from the get. No complaints! The brick color is lovely and just what I was looking for. Sure to enjoy this duvet set for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved the softness and the inside ties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good material. Real linen.
reviews.reviewText: This duet cover set is very beautiful.good material and high quality,.I just love it, but had to return it because it’s a little lighter color than looks in the picture and video. I highly recommend it if you are looking for a light brick red color duvet cover set .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bedsure does it again! I’ve ordered from Bedsure many times previously, they are definitely my go-to for Amazon bedding. I was very interested in this new brand, but I was hesitant to buy due to the price point. However, the color was perfect for my room and I figured it would be an investment. First, the color is absolutely gorgeous, which I expected. What I didn’t expect was how soft it would be. This is my first linen duvet and I wasn’t quite sure what to expect, but I absolutely love it. I was also a bit worried that the Queen size would be too big on my 90x90 insert, but it settled very well. Overall, I’m obsessed and excited to see how this holds up over time. I can’t wait to try the other sheets and blankets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Thin and not like the image displayed
reviews.reviewText: I am returning immediately. The images are extremely contradictory and what I received was more of a bedsheet than a comforter. Overly priced and not what I paid for.
